Question: As the fans cheered wildly, this person's parents ran onto the field as well.
Hints: The Braves assigned this person to the Eau Claire Bears, the Braves' Northern League Class-C farm team.
On May 1, 1975, this person broke baseball's all-time RBI record, previously held by Ruth with 2,213.
In 1988 this person was inducted into the Wisconsin Athletic Hall of Fame for his time spent on the Milwaukee Braves.
